description:
Karasuma is a bit of a space case, but Harima’s imagination is out of this world! Harima will have to run like the wind to turn in his comic before it’s too late. As for Tenma, could her dream to be Karasuma’s cutie really come true?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Totsuzen no "Sayonara"... Mayoikonda Labyrinth... Anata wa Dare?... Oshiete. "Surechigai" "Kataomoi" Todoke, Boku no Kimochi. Todoke, Watashi no Omoi. Tabun Ichido Shikanai Kisetsu, Seishun no 1 Page. Kore ga Saigo no Chance, Tashikametai... Kimi no Kimochi. Tsutawaru Kotoba, Tsutawaranai Omoi. Ano Hi no Kokuhaku, Eien no Ichinichi, dakedo... Itsumademo Tsuzuite Iku, Watashitachi no "Ima". Soshite Ashita e... "School Rumble Forever"

突然の「さよなら」...迷い込んだラビリンス... あなたはだれ?... 教えて. 「すれちがい」「片想い」とどけ, ボクの気持ち. とどけ, ワタシの想い. たぶん一度しかない季節, 青春の1ページ. これが最後のチャンス, 確かめたい... キミの気持ち. 伝わる言葉, 伝わらない想い. あの日の告白, 永遠の一日, だけど... いつまでも続いていく, わたしたちの「いま」. そして明日へ...「スクールランブルフォーエバー」
